title: I wish there were more random clothing options than there are.
body:
I can't find a single place that sells fly as shit shoulder capes.

And Bloodborne has reminded me, via the Cainhurst armor, that I really want a cool looking shoulder cape.

Why don't people sell capes?
The world needs more capes.
Capes of all shapes and sizes.
For everyone who isn't a super hero, because then capes are a safety hazard.
